Row.Text: Our people are now waving your Confederate Flags and drinking your Cola. I hope this madness does not spread to the rest of the world.
Marker Building placed on war outbreak.

War has ravaged our lands, it might be time for reconstruction...[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Georgia [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be at peace but been at war in the past [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a Worker. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Workers get 25% improvement speed.
